subject: Sales
title: Information as Leverage
description: A fast breakdown of Information as Leverage for builders.

hook.text: A car buyer researches dealer cost online. The salesman's usual tricks suddenly stop working.

buildup.text: Information is the currency of negotiation. The side that knows more controls the conversation.

discovery.text: Top negotiators spend 80% of their time preparing and only 20% talking. Preparation is the weapon.

twist.text: Sharing info selectively can be powerful too. Revealing a small detail often draws out a big one.

climax.text: Never enter a negotiation without knowing the other side's needs, constraints, and options.

punchline.text: Whoever knows more wins more. Prepare accordingly.

quiz.question: How much time do top negotiators spend preparing?
